name: Chopdown v0.5
description:
This is Chopdown! A game all about chopping down trees to earn points! When you earn a lot of points, check out the point shop! It allows you to buy special items with points you earned! Oh, by the way, you just click on this game. Very satisfying indeed!

P.S. this took 4+ hours to make. (Probably like 20+ as a whole, not in a row)

I remade this for itch.io! But you can still play the scratch version!
